description:
paidContent.org is a web site that covers the business of digital media and entertainment. Based in New York, it is owned by Guardian News and Media Limited of the UK. paidContent covers the business of digital media, serving decision makers within the media, entertainment, publishing, advertising, marketing and technology sectors. 
 
Our app is simple and easy to navigate, supporting an optimized reading experience from your mobile. The app includes access to real-time news and analysis, the ability to retrieve full content offline -- from a plane or subway, e.g. -- and the option of saving stories for later reading. You can also easily share our content via email and sites like Twitter and Facebook.
